column1: Uchi////Since it was our first time
column3: which was around $125/person. I ordered the kara kyuri cocktail
column5: citrusy cucumber water with a spicy kick. Since the dishes were chef's choice
column6: I don't know the exact name of the dishes but every thing tasted amazing! As for dessert
column7: we received the jasmine cream and coconut tapioca. We also ordered the fried milk and we liked this better than the desserts that were offered on the omakase.
